altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.ja: リアル

description.en:
Nomiya Tomomi, a high school drop-out who wants to devote his life to helping Natsumi, a girl he sentenced to a life of immobility after a tragic bike ride he invited her on, tries to change his life around, from a trouble making delinquent into a reliable man. The problem is, both Natsumi and her sister dont seem to care at all for Nomiya, rightfuly blaming him for the accident. Plus, the only notable talent Nomiya posseses is the talent for basketball. Everything changes for him when he meets up with Togawa Kiyoharu, a wheelchair basketball player.

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Prize for Manga in 2001**
description.es-la: Un accidente de motocicleta, cáncer de huesos, un camión que va a toda velocidad y atropella a un chico que lleva una bicicleta robada... trágicos acontecimientos que cambian la vida de tres jóvenes. Estas tres personalidades tan diferentes tienen una sola cosa en común: su pasión por el baloncesto.
description.pt-br: O que você faria se praticasse algum esporte que necessitasse muito das pernas e de repente se visse incapacitado de andar?, ou se a sociedade não colocasse nenhuma perspectiva de sucesso para você? Togawa Kiyoharu, Hisanobu e Nomiya Tomomi se encontram presos a esses problemas que se tornam fantasmas ou demônios que os atormentam a cada dia, e como essas histórias irão se ligar? Descubra lendo Real, uma obra do Fantástico e aclamado Takehiko Inoue criador de Slam Dunk e Vagabond!.

altTitles.ja: おとぎぶっ殺シアム

description.en:
"Granma didn't tell' em like that..."

Everyone has a favorite hero from their fairy tales, but who's the strongest of them all!?

This is a tale of death and rebirth. In order to accomplish their dream, hopes, wishes, revenge and salvation, the heroes of classic fairy tales will engage in a duel to death!

The warriors are resurrected and summoned to the Nightmare Coliseum by a mysterious monster who calls himself "Grimm P." and he promises the ultimate prize "You can resurrect anyone you want and live happily ever after"

This tournament is filled with bloody carnage, if you want to win, you better toss common sense out of the way because it is not needed.





This is a dark fantasy battle action manga where bizarre characters from fairy tales come to life. Legends like Red Riding Hood, Snow White, Pinocchio, and Beauty and the Beast engage in surrealistic killing matches. Right of the bat, we have Son Goku versus Momotaro!



32 characters will engage in sudden transformations, bloody battles, and tragic stories that will keep you on the edge of your seat.



Sure grandma didn't tell 'em like that!!

title.en: The Moon on a Rainy Night

altTitles.ja: 雨夜の月

altTitles.fr: The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)

altTitles.pt-br: A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa

altTitles.es-la: La luna en una noche lluviosa

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her.
description.ja:
2人の少女の、目には見えないもの、かけがえのないこと。

金田一咲希は高校入学直前のある日、ピアノレッスンに向かう途中で見知らぬ同世代の少女とぶつかり手を擦りむくが、相手から無言のまま真っすぐに見つめられた後、落とした楽譜を丁寧に拾われ絆創膏をもらう。咲希は印象的だったその少女とクラスメイトとして再会し、名前が及川奏音、そして耳が不自由だと知る。学校では障害を理由に周囲と距離を置く奏音に、淋しさを覚えた咲希はどうにか分かり合おうとし、そんな彼女の姿に奏音の態度も次第に変わっていき…。
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.

altTitles.ja: 空手小公子こひなたみのる
空手小公子小日向海流

description.en: Kohinata Minoru is a college student at a college that is popular for its sports rather than academic orientation. He starts out as a gymnast alongside his friend, Nana, but is bullied by his gymnast seniors. One evening, a karate student at the college, Mutou Ryuuji, witnesses Minoru being bullied and comes to his rescue and drags him into the world of karate. Minoru makes new friends and learns some of their dark pasts, including a shocking death that reveals motives for revenge. (from Baka-Updates)

description.en: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!
description.ja: ウチのかわいすぎる妻は、なぜ超平凡な自分と結婚したのか――!?　自己評価激低な夫・槌岡直継は、妻・憙乃への疑念から“マリッジグレー”に陥っていた！　一方の憙乃は、日々溢れまくる直継へのLOVEを抑えるのに一生懸命で…!?　相思相愛な新婚夫婦の、激甘かけ違いラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: Minha esposa é muito suspeita! Eu não entendo por que ela se casou com alguém como eu? Por que uma mulher bonita, inteligente, e considerada como a Yoshino se casaria com alguém comum como Naotsugu!! Não há casamento azul aqui, apenas um suspeito caso de casamento cinza!!

altTitles.zh-hk: 撿到了男主，多了個老公

description.en:
Her family used all their money for her extravagance and luxuries and brought a crisis of bankruptcy. While trying to figure out how to pay off their debts, she found a leaflet from the duke looking for a lost child. The reward is so much money that she could play and eat even after she payed off her debts! Following the memories of reading this book, right away, Lizelle picked up the boy who was caught in a trash dump in a poor village. She took the lost Lapel and went to the duke.

"This is the child the Duke is looking for."

Duke Chester said, looking at me with a doubtful glaze, "I need confirmation, so you should stay with my nephew in this house for the time being."

The strange cohabitation of the three people started like that. However, Lapel keeps thinking of her as a mother and won't let her leave.

"Let's get married."

Lizelle was startled by the unexpected words, "Are you insane? Did you drink?"

"One year. If you perform a contract marriage for one year, I will pay you ten times the amount of the rewards you were given."

"Can I call you 'honey'?"

And the contract marriage and marital life began. But why are his eyes constantly changing? Why do you keep coming every night!

---
Notorious for her extravagant spending, Wilhazelle Fossier drove her house to complete financial ruin. To pay her family's debt, she resolves to collect a bounty from the wealthy Duke Heillos by finding his missing nephew. Although her search is successful, until the skeptical duke can confirm the young boy's identity, Wilhazelle must spend one month living at the Heillos manor. But when one month turns into one year and a contract marriage, she starts to wonder if the money is worth it!

---

description.fr:
Sa famille a utilisé tous leurs argents pour des extravagances et du luxe, ce qui a provoqué leur faillite… Alors qu'elle essayait de rembourser leurs dettes, elle trouvât un prospectus du Duc qui recherchait un enfant perdu. La récompense était si généreuse qu'avec ça, ils pourraient vivre confortablement même après avoir remboursé leurs dettes! Suite aux souvenirs de la lecture de ce livre, tout de suite, Lizelle retrouva le garçon qui était coincé dans un pauvre village. Elle le prit donc avec elle, afin de toucher la récompense. «C'est l'enfant que le duc recherche.» Le duc Chester étant dubitatif, il l'obligea à rester avec l'enfant dans sa demeure le temps de prouver que cet enfant est bien le sien. L'étrange cohabitation de ces trois personnes commença alors comme ça…

---

description.id:
Hobi berfoya-foya Lizelle membuat keluarganya terjerat utang di lintah darah. Sialnya, aku merasuk ke dalam tubuhnya setelah semuanya telanjur kacau! Lalu, aku melihat pengumuman anak hilang beserta imbalannya... Aku tahu siapa dan di mana dia! Raphelion Heillos—si tokoh utama tampan, hebat, dari keluarga Duke, dan yang jelas sekarang dia... masih ada di tempat pembuangan sampah! Aku akan memulangkannya, dapat imbalan, bayar utang, dan hidup makmur sebagai bangsawan! Sayangnya, rencana simpel itu dikacaukan Chester Heillos—paman Raphelion.

description.ko:
'허영심에 가득 찬 웨르아젤 프로시에' 

그것이 내 별명이었다.
정확히 말하자면 내가 빙의하기 전 웨르아젤의 별명.
웨르아젤 진 빚을 수습하기 위해 백방으로 돈을 구할 방법을 찾던 도중!
공작가에서 잃어버린 아이를 찾는다는 전단지를 발견했다.

사례금은 빚을 청산하고도 펑펑 쓸 수 있는 돈.
냉큼 원작 남주인 아이를 주워 공작 가에 데리고 왔는데…

“이 아이가 라펠리온이라는 걸 어떻게 확신합니까.”

공작이 나를 사기꾼으로 취급하는 것으로 모자라,

“한 달 동안 이 저택에서 함께 지내시죠.”

당장 사기가 아니라는 증명을 할 수 없으니
한 달 동안 같이 지내잔다.

그런데!

“결혼하죠.
 딱 1년 동안만 계약 결혼을 해주면 사례금의 10배를 얹어 주죠.”

이제는 나한테 결혼까지 하잰다.

“여보라고 부르면 될까요?”

일 년 동안만 결혼한다면 사례금의 열배를 준다는데 당연히 승낙해야지!
그렇게 시작된 일 년 동안의 계약 결혼.

그런데 왜 자꾸 눈빛이 낯뜨겁게 변하는 건데?
왜 자꾸 밤마다 찾아오는 건데?

---

description.ru:
Ее семья жила на широкую руку и в скором времени обанкротились. Пытаясь придумать, как расплатиться с долгами, она нашла листовку от герцога, который искал потерявшегося ребенка. Награда - столько денег, что можно играть и есть даже после выплаты долгов! По воспоминаниям о прочтении этой книги, Лизель сразу же нашла мальчика, деревенской свалке. Она взяла потерянного Лапеля и пошла к герцогу. Так началось странное сожительство трех людей. Однако Лапель продолжает думать обо мне как о матери и не хочет ее оставлять. "Давай поженимся". Лизель была поражена неожиданными словами. "Ты с ума сошел? Ты пил?" "1 год. Если ты заключишь контрактный брак на один год, я заплачу тебе 10-кратную сумму вознаграждения". Так начался брак по контракту и супружеская жизнь. Но почему мои глаза постоянно меняются? Почему ты продолжаешь приходить каждую ночь!

description.uk:
Сім'я Лізель звикла жити на широку руку і незабаром збанкрутували. Намагаючись придумати, як розплатитися з боргами, вона знаходить листівку від герцога, що шукав втрачену дитину. Нагорода - стільки грошей, що можна знову поживати навіть після виплати боргів! За спогадами із прочитаної книги Лізель одразу ж знаходить хлопчика на сільському звалищі. Однак знайдений, Лапель, продовжує думати про неї як про матір і не хоче розлучатися.

"Якщо ти укладеш зі мною фіктивний шлюб на один рік, я заплачу тобі десятиразову суму винагороди".

Так розпочався шлюб за контрактом та подружнє життя. Але з чого раптом такі зміни? Чому ти продовжуєш приходити щоночі?!

description.zh-hk:
‘虛榮心滿滿的韋爾阿澤爾·普羅西耶’，這是我的別名。準確來說，這是我穿越之前，韋爾阿澤爾的別名。
為了替韋爾阿澤爾還債，我千方百計尋找掙錢的辦法！這時我發現了公爵家尋找丟失的孩子的告示。
而高額的報酬足夠將債務還清。撿到原作中的男主後本想帶到公爵家…“你怎麼就確信這孩子是拉菲利翁。”
公爵不僅把我當成騙子，還對我說“你就在這裡住一個月吧。”無法立刻證明我不是個騙子，我只好同意了。
可是！ “我們結婚吧。只要和我契約結婚一年，我就給你十倍報酬。”現在他竟然讓我和他結婚。
“我可以叫你老婆嗎？”他說過只要結婚一年，就會給我十倍報酬，我當然沒法拒絕啊。
就這樣我們開始了為期一年的契約婚姻。可是為什麼感覺他的目光變得灼熱？為什麼總是夜裡來找我？

---

description.en:
For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins…

description.en: A slice-of-life story about two siblings, both jobless shut-ins. Haruko is a teenage girl who shares with her brother a love of laying around the house in sweats, watching television and playing video games. Her brother has a few friends, but Haruko has a lot of problems with social anxiety. The two of them pass their days happily playing together, though their mother worries about how she's going to get Haruko to shape up enough to find a husband.
description.pt: Haruko é uma adolescente que compartilha com seu irmão um amor de ficar em casa de moletom, assistindo televisão e jogando videogames. Seu irmão tem alguns amigos, mas Haruko tem um monte de problemas com ansiedade social. Os dois passam seus dias felizes brincando juntos, embora sua mãe se preocupa sobre como Haruko vai ficar e se melhorar o suficiente para encontrar um marido.
description.es-la: La historia del día a día de dos hermanos, ambos encerrados y sin trabajo. Haruko es una adolescente que comparte con su hermano el amor por holgazanear en la casa en sudaderas, mirar televisión y jugar videojuegos. Su hermano tiene algunos amigos, pero Haruko tiene muchos problemas de ansiedad social. Los dos pasan sus días felices jugando juntos, aunque a su madre le preocupa cómo hará que Haruko se ponga en forma lo suficiente como para encontrar un marido.

Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."

description.en:
Player name, Yuuki. Seventeen. Place of residence: murder games.

Dressed up in a maid outfit attempting to find her way out of a death mansion, murdering other players clad in a bunny suit, and such to win money is how she makes a living. For some reason, she chose to stay "here" no matter what. 

Overcoming the border between life and death, she aims to attain an unprecedented 「99 Consecutive Wins」.

プレイヤーネーム：幽鬼《ユウキ》
17歳、生業はデスゲーム。

一攫千金、かつ命懸け。参加者は美少女限定。正真正銘、人が死ぬショービジネス。そんな“死亡遊戯”が、天職で、生き甲斐。なんとなく、でも“ここ”に決めた。美しく、容赦なく。めくるめく死線を切り抜けろ。戯れに、切実に。前人未踏の「99連勝」を目指せ!!

description.en: Plants have evolved. They can now feed on humans and become terrible monsters known as Jinka. Kingo and Kayano do their best to survive in a Tokyo overrun by plants, but when Kayano becomes a Jinka, Kingo will do anything he can to get her back!
description.ja: それは「人花」と呼ばれ、植物が人間を狩る側へと進化を遂げた。血の繋がりは無いが幼い頃から共に生きるキンゴとカヤノは植物に覆われた東京で“家族”に憧れて二人でひっそりと暮らす。そんな中カヤノは自らに寄生する人花を人花処理を任務とする“花葬隊”に見つかってしまい…。本当の家族になる為にも、カヤノを元の人間に戻すことを誓ったキンゴの戦いが始まる――!!

description.en:
Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously. Now, and the trash Ye Chen is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" 

This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky!

description.az: Cəvahiratlar ölkəsi (Houseki no Kuni), meteoritlərin altı dəfə Yerə düşdüyü və bu prosesdə onu məhv etdiyi uzaq gələcəkdə baş verir. Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. Fosfofillit (Phos) zəifdir (ən aşağı sərtliklərdən birinə malikdir) və həmyaşıdları tərəfindən yararsız hesab edilir. Phos'a təbiət tarixinin ensiklopediyasını yaratmaq tapşırığı verildikdən sonra o, uzaq, lakin müdrik həmkarı Kinovarın (Cinnabar) köməyinə müraciət edir, beləliklə onların dostluğu və şəxsi inkişafı başlayır. Eyni zamanda “Cəvahirat camaatı” onun dəbdəbəli dəyərindən yararlanmaq istəyən Aydan gələnlərlə (aylılarla) müharibə aparır.
description.en: In the distant future, a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers, Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.

But when he steps foot into Orario’s pleasure quarter, where Ishtar Familia reigns supreme, he soon finds himself in way over his head... With enemies all around him, he’ll need the help of a beautiful, fox-eared courtesan if he’s to have any hope of making it back home!

И именно здесь парень, мечтающий стать авантюристом, знакомится с маленькой богиней, не нашедшей ни одного последователя. Yuri-chan và bạn trai của cô ấy, Aono-kun, đã có một mối tình tuyệt vời cho đến một ngày, Aono-kun bỗng dưng qua đời... Họ sẽ không bao giờ đến được với nhau, và họ không thể chạm vào nhau. Đây là một câu chuyện về tình yêu chân thành nhưng cũng đầy những chông gai.

description.ja: 童貞高校生のゴトウが好きになったのはセックス大好きなギャル・アガワさん。ある日の放課後、彼女が同級生とセックスしているところを見てしまって──。
description.vi: Con đũy tình yêu đã dẫn nam chính của ta đi thích một gyaru lẳng lơ sẵn sàng làm nháy với bất cứ ai. Rồi anh main sẽ làm gì trước cái tình huống NTR nhưng không hẳn này? Khuyến cáo ko dành cho trẻ dưới 18 và các thanh niên không thích NTR. Đọc truyện này đừng lắp đầu trên vào làm gì (lắp đầu dưới thì OK).
description.es-la: Un virgen estudiante de secundaria, por casualidad descubre a la gal de la que se estaba empezando a enamorar teniendo sexo con otro estudiante.
description.pt-br: Uma Gal safada que deixa todo mundo transar com ela e um garoto virgem do ensino médio apaixonado por ela, mesmo depois de vê-la transar com seu colega de classe.

altTitles.ja: シトラスプラス

description.en: High schoolers (and stepsisters) Yuzu and Mei have gone public with their relationship! The two are happy to be dating out in the open, but friends and family keep trying to butt in with advice. Can Yuzu and Mei figure things out on their own?
description.it: Seguito di Citrus ambientato dopo la fine del manga! Yuzu è riuscita a convincere Mei a tornare da lei e le ha chiesto di sposarla! In Citrus+ seguiremo le vicende delle due ragazze una volta riunite e delle loro amiche che non le lasciano mai sole.
description.pt-br: As estudantes do ensino médio (e meias-irmãs) Yuzu e Mei foram a público com seu relacionamento! As duas estão felizes em namorar ao ar livre, mas amigos e familiares continuam tentando se aproximar com conselhos. Yuzu e Mei podem resolver as coisas sozinhas?

description.en:
Byul, a popular alpha and a first-year high school student, once trained to be an idol but has since left that path to attend school like a regular kid. His world takes an unexpected turn with the sudden birth of a younger sibling, introducing new challenges to his daily routine. Byul's childhood friend, Siwoo, has secretly harbored feelings for him for years. However, both being alphas, Siwoo has kept his emotions hidden.

As the two navigate their growing closeness after a period of time apart, Byul faces adolescence head-on, grappling with friendships, family relationships, and his sense of identity. Along the way, he rediscovers his passion for music and begins to mature through these transformative experiences.
description.pl:
"Byul, popularny alfa i uczeń pierwszej klasy liceum, kiedyś trenował, aby zostać idolem, ale od tego czasu porzucił tę ścieżkę, aby uczęszczać do szkoły jak zwykłe dziecko. Jego świat przybiera nieoczekiwany obrót wraz z nagłymi narodzinami młodszego rodzeństwa, wprowadzając nowe wyzwania do jego codziennej rutyny. Przyjaciel Byula z dzieciństwa, Siwoo, od lat skrycie żywi do niego uczucia. Jednak Siwoo, będąc alfą, ukrywał swoje emocje.

Podczas gdy obaj radzą sobie z rosnącą bliskością po okresie rozłąki, Byul staje twarzą w twarz z dorastaniem, zmagając się z przyjaźniami, relacjami rodzinnymi i poczuciem tożsamości. Po drodze na nowo odkrywa swoją pasję do muzyki i zaczyna dojrzewać dzięki tym transformującym doświadczeniom".

altTitles.ja: ごぜほたる

description.en: After losing her mother early on, Hotaru, a girl surrounded by warmth and tranquility, finds her life taking a dramatic turn. An unexpected event draws her into the world of “Goze”, setting her on a path through unknown lands with music as her guide. Armed with her talent and a heart full of questions, she embarks on a quest, seeking her missing father and her true calling…!
description.pt-br: Depois de perder a mãe muito cedo, Hotaru, uma garota cercada de calor e tranquilidade, vê sua vida tomar um rumo dramático. Um evento inesperado a leva ao mundo de “Goze”, colocando-a em um caminho por terras desconhecidas, tendo a música como guia. Dotada por seu talento e com o coração cheio de perguntas, ela embarca em uma jornada em busca de seu pai desaparecido e de sua verdadeira vocação...!

altTitles.ja: ナルト
NARUTO―ナルト― カラー版

description.en: Twelve years ago, the powerful Nine-Tailed Demon Fox attacked the ninja village of Konohagakure. The demon was quickly defeated and sealed into the infant Naruto Uzumaki, by the Fourth Hokage who sacrificed his life to protect the village. Now Naruto is the number one knucklehead ninja who's determined to become the next Hokage and gain recognition by everyone who ever doubted him!
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Naruto". Uzumaki Naruto é um garoto que teve um demônio preso dentro dele quando era um bebê, para evitar que esse demônio destruísse sua vila. Ele cresceu sendo temido por todos, já que existe a lembrança dos mortos pelo demônio em quase todas as famílias. Evitado e ignorado, tudo o que ele realmente deseja é ser amado e reconhecido pelos outros, pelo que de fato ele é. Acompanhe a vida de Naruto, seu amor pela "doce e amável" Sakura e sua "amizade" com Sasuke... Uma história aparentemente simples, em que o herói acumula poderes e vence os malvados, fazendo amigos no caminho, certo? Errado. Naruto tem ação e comédia, sim, mas o tema central do mangá é a solidão e como cada um dos personagens lida com essa solidão. A leveza cômica de alguns capítulos é francamente contrastante com o clima pesado e trágico de outros.

description.en: “Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
description.fr: Les "chimères" sont des personnes auxquelles on a infusé de l'ADN animal afin de leur donner des superpouvoirs et des capacités, mais la société ne les favorise pas, si bien qu'elles vivent dans la peur et le rejet. Notre personnage principal, dont le nom de code est "01", travaille comme un mercenaire qui tombe sur une vieille connaissance. Il est ensuite chargé de protéger et de transporter Enoch, une fille qui est recherchée pour être le "matériel" parfait, jusqu'aux frontières du Canada.
description.pt: “Quimeras” são pessoas que foram infundidas com DNA animal para receber superpoderes e habilidades, mas a sociedade os despreza e vivem marginalizados. Nosso protagonista, codinome “01”, trabalha como um mercenário e recebe a missão de proteger e levar Enoch, o “material” perfeito, à fronteira do Canadá.

altTitles.fr: La Grande Jahy ne Perd Jamais

altTitles.en: The Great Jahy Will Not Be Defeated!

altTitles.ja: ジャヒー様はくじけない！

description.en:
Jahy-sama (pronounced jah-hee) is an existence to be feared and respected throughout the Demon Realm. Well, was.

The (former) Demon Realm No. 2 is now busy with house chores and work…in the human realm! Her dinner is just beansprouts, and she can't afford anything except water at cafes, but she won't get discouraged!

---
**Note:**
Jahy's shirt says '魔界復興', which seems to translate to 'Demon Realm Restoration'.
description.ru: Джахи-сама - существо, которое боялись и уважали во всем демоническом мире. Ну, когда-то... Вторая по силе (прежде) мира демонов теперь занята домашними заботами и работой... в человеческом мире! Её ужин - одна фасоль, а в кафе она не может себе позволить ничего кроме воды, но её никогда не сломить!

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

altTitles.en: A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma
The Person I Met In-Game Was Actually My Big Sister

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322302001578/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

title.en: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita

altTitles.ja: 失恋したのでVtuberはじめたら年上のお姉さんにモテました

altTitles.ja-ro: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita

altTitles.en: I Was Heartbroken, So I Became A VTuber, But Then I Became Popular with the Older Ladies

altTitles.vi: Tuyệt vọng vì thất tình, tôi quyết định trở thành Vtuber vang danh

description.en:
Shocked after Yuki Himemura found out that the club senpai he was crushing on got a boyfriend, he decided to become a VTuber—something both he and his senpai have always liked—and used his savings to assemble his equipment.

He gets his virtual character designed only to discover that it’s a 3D model of a cute girl and, in the process, unintentionally ends up portraying one!

Not only that but the person who designed and rigged his model and his favorite VTubers are starting to take a liking to him…?

(Synopsis via Novel Updates)
description.ja: ずっと想いを寄せていた部活の先輩に彼氏が出来た事を知った姫村優希は、ショックの余り先輩も自分も元々好きだったVtuberに自分がなってしまおうと貯金を叩いて機材を揃えてしまう。そして自分のバーチャル肉体をデザインしてもらったらなんとまさかの美少女3Dモデルで意図せず女の子になりきる事に!?

description.fr: Tomber amoureux devrait être une expérience excitante... mais pas pour Hari ! Notre héroïne est maudite par l'amour non réciproque, et Yura compte bien en profiter. Hari réussira-t-elle à avouer ses sentiments à son premier amour, ou se laissera-t-elle emporter par les complications de cet amour non partagé ? Son histoire d'amour passionnante est sur le point de commencer.
description.ko:
사랑에 빠지면 짜릿하다는데… 그래도 이건 아니잖아! 
짝사랑으로 인해 저주에 걸려버린 하리와 그 저주를 빌려달라는 유라.
하리는 과연 짝남 정원에게 고백할 것인가? 아니면 짝사랑을 포기할 것인가?
짜릿짜릿 하리의 첫사랑 전기 시작!

title.en: Otaku ni Yasashii Gal wa Inai!?

altTitles.ja: オタクに優しいギャルはいない!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru wa Inai!?
Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ha Inai!?

altTitles.en: Gal Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?
Gals Can't Be Kind To A Geek!?

altTitles.zh: 没有辣妹会对阿宅温柔!?

altTitles.pt-br: Gal Não Pode ser Gentil com Otaku!?

altTitles.es-la: ¿¡Las Gals no pueden ser amables con los Otakus!?

altTitles.vi: Gyaru không thể tử tế với Otaku ư?

description.en: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
description.ja: あまり大きな声で好きと言えない“女児向けアニメ”が好きなオタク 瀬尾卓也。ある日、クラスのギャル 天音さんと伊地知さんに絡まれたのだが、何やら天音さんもオタクの匂いが…？
description.vi: Một anh bạn trung bình Otaku thích anime dành cho bé gái, giáp mặt hai nàng Gyaru xinh đẹp nổi tiếng nhất trường. Nhưng không chỉ có thế, một trong hai nữ nhân xinh đẹp ấy có gì đó...hơi otaku thì phải...?
description.es-la: Takuya Seo es un otaku al que le gusta el "anime para chicas" y no puede decir que le guste en voz alta. Un día, se junta con dos chicas de su clase, Amane e Ijichi, pero parece que Amane también es una otaku...
description.pt-br: Takuya Seo é um otaku que gosta de "animes para garotinhas" e não pode dizer isso em voz alta. Um dia, ele conversa com duas gals da sua sala, Amane e Ijichi, mas parece que a Amane também é uma otaku... Uma comédia romântica escolar onde o otaku conhece as gals que ele gosta!

altTitles.ja: Ueki no Housoku
うえきの法則

description.en:
A group of powerful beings called tenkaijin are holding a special tournament. The rules of the game–each tenkaijin selects a kid in junior high to be his champion and grants him a special power. The kids take each other on in heated battle, but if they hurt innocent bystanders, then they lose one of their natural-given abilities. Every time they win a battle, they gain a new ability. The ultimate winner of the tournament is granted any power of his choosing, and the tenkajin who he represents succeeds in becoming the next god. Kosuke Ueki has been chosen to fight in the tournament. His special power–the ability to turn garbage into trees.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Law of Ueki** (2006)

altTitles.vi: Nhân vật Webtoon  Na Kang Lim

altTitles.pt-br: Personagem de Webtoon: Na Kang Lim

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.
description.vi: Na Kang Lim, nam sinh trung học bình trường rất thích đọc webtoon. Một ngày, đã có chuyện bất ngờ xảy ra, nữ chính từ bộ webtoon cậu hay đọc đã xuất hiện ngoài đợi thật. Những sự cố trong webtoon khiến cô ấy rơi vào khủng hoảng, nhưng nhân vật chính lại không có ở đây để giải cứu nữ chính! Và Kang Lim đã trở thành nhân vật chính cùng với kí ước từ bộ truyện và khả năng du hành thời gian để cứu nữ chính
description.pt-br: Na Kang Lim, um estudante do ensino médio que gosta de ler webtoons, vivencia um evento estranho um dia, quando a protagonista de seu webtoon favorito aparece diante dele. Mais surpreendente ainda, os mesmos incidentes que a colocam em perigo no webtoon começam a acontecer na vida real. O problema é que, no mundo real, não há um protagonista para salvá-la! No fim, Na Kang Lim assume o papel do protagonista, voltando no tempo para salvá-la.

altTitles.en: Get to the point instead of beating around the bush

altTitles.ja: 恋愛エトセトラ

description.en:
Just when Chu Hyejin, a freshman in college, is about to start her independent college life, she encounters a crisis. Her first love, Cha Haejun lives right next to her?! And on top of that, she is the one who dumped him when they dated in middle-school!  
  
A 15-year old's clumsy and awkward first love soon came to an end but will things be different this time when they're 20?  
  
(Note: Gatabutata is a Korean saying that means "Get to the point instead of beating around the bush".)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/zaiciyujianni/list?title_no=1466)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000950)
description.fr:
Au moment où Chu Hyejin, une étudiante de première année, est sur le point de commencer sa vie d'étudiante indépendante, elle est confrontée à une crise. Son premier amour, Cha Haejun, vit juste à côté d'elle ! Et en plus de cela, c'est elle qui l'a largué quand ils sont sortis ensemble au collège !

Le premier amour maladroit et gênant d'une jeune fille de 15 ans touche à sa fin, mais les choses seront-elles différentes cette fois-ci à 20 ans ?

(Note : Gatabutata est un dicton coréen qui signifie "Va droit au but au lieu de tourner autour du pot").
description.ja:
人生初の一人暮らしに胸をときめかせていた琴梨(ことり)。 しかし、引っ越し先のお隣に住んでいたのは中学の時に付き合ってた元カレだった⁉ 再会した初恋の彼ともう一度、甘酸っぱい恋を始める！

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/zaiciyujianni/list?title_no=1466)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000950)
description.ko:
모든 게 서툴고 어색했던 중학교 2학년 15살의 첫 연애.
그렇게 헤어졌던 첫사랑을 같은 대학, 자취방 바로 옆집에서 다시 마주하다!
사랑이 뭔지, 연애가 뭔지 아직도 헷갈리고 서툴기만 한 스무 살. 과연 이번엔
스스로에게 당당하고 서로를 솔직하게 마주하는 연애에 성공할 수 있을까?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/zaiciyujianni/list?title_no=1466)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000950)
description.zh:
如果再次遇见初恋，
你的选择还会一如从前吗？
在同一所大学与初恋邂逅，甚至发现他居然住我隔壁！二十岁的花季，对爱情还是懵懵懂懂，这次能否坦诚面对，最终有情人终成眷属？

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/zaiciyujianni/list?title_no=1466)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000950)

description.en:
After breaking up with her trashy ex-boyfriend, Jung Eunkyo spends her days peacefully running a café with her friend Kim Haeda. But then, someone appears to disturb her calm life.

“Sunbae, I like you. I fell in love with you at first sight.”

Lee Jaeheon, a young, handsome man who seems to have a twisted side. Eunkyo begins to feel attracted to Jaeheon, who approaches her without hesitation... But Eunkyo’s life, which was already shaken by this new relationship, gradually begins to experience greater turmoil.

(18+ version)

On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
description.fr: Le jour où Shiho, champion de kendo décide d’aider sa mère célibataire à tenir un restaurant de gukbap, il apprend que sa sœur, Shiyeon, s’est suicidée. Pendant les funérailles, Shiho se rend compte que quelque chose cloche. Ce n’était pas un suicide, elle a été assassinée. Pour découvrir la vérité et venger la mort de sa sœur, Shiho reprend son sabre et entame sa propre guerre.
description.ru:
В день, когда мастер кендо Шихо решает всё бросить и помочь своей матери-одиночке в управлении небольшим ресторанчиком, он узнаёт о том, что его младшая сестра Шиён, которая училась в университете Сеула, покончила с собой. 
Во время похорон Шихо замечает кое-что странное. 
Чтобы узнать правду и отомстить за смерть сестры, Шихо снова берёт в руки уже знакомый меч и начинает свою собственную войну.

altTitles.ja: 暁のヨナ

altTitles.en: Yona: The Girl Standing in the Blush of Dawn

altTitles.ru: Иона: Девушка, стоящая в лучах рассвета

altTitles.th: กู้บัลลังก์มังกรแดง

altTitles.id: Yona, The Girl Standing in the Blush

description.de: Als einzige Tochter von König Il ist Yona die Prinzessin eines kleinen Reiches namens Koka. Zur Feier ihres 16. Geburtstags kehrt ihr Cousin Su-won, in den sie schon lange verliebt ist, in den Palast zurück. Doch er verfolgt einen finsteren In der Nacht ermordet Su-won Yonas Vater mit seinem Schwert. Yona muss die schreckliche Tat mit ansehen, kann jedoch mit ihrem Leibwächter und Jugendfreund Hak vor den einfallenden Soldaten fliehen. Aber auch außerhalb des Palastes lauern viele Gefahren…
description.en:
Yona is the sole princess of the Kingdom of Kouka, living a luxurious and carefree life as a princess should. She has it all: the finest clothes and cosmetics, the most divine sweets, a loving emperor as a father, and the hottest cousin crush, Soo-won, any girl could ever hope to have. Now, if only her bodyguard, Son Hak, weren't so annoying towards her, and if her hair weren't so red…

But her nearly perfect world quickly shatters as the man she loves, Soo-won, murders her father and the path to his ascension to the throne is assured. Son Hak escapes with Yona, and they lead a life on the run from that point on.

---
Yona reels from the shock of witnessing a loved one’s murder and having to fight for her life. With Hak’s help, she flees the palace and struggles to survive while evading her enemy’s forces. But where will this displaced princess go when all the paths before her are uncertain?
  


---
description.es: El futuro del reino de Kôka se encuentra en manos de la princesa Yona, una joven que ha pasado su vida bajo los atentos cuidados de su padre, el rey, y su escolta Hak. Con motivo de su 16º cumpleaños, su primo Soo-won, de quien está enamorada, viene a visitarla, pero... ¡le aguarda un cruel destino que jamás habría imaginado!
description.fr: Yona, princesse du royaume de Kôka, a grandi dans l’insouciance, choyée par le roi et protégée par son garde du corps et ami d’enfance, le puissant guerrier, Hak. À l’approche de ses 16 ans, Yona est heureuse: son cousin et amour secret, Soo-won, vient lui rendre visite pour célébrer son anniversaire. Mais ce soir-là, une terrible tragédie survient et sa vie va être bouleversée à jamais!
description.id:
“Aku tidak minta banyak-banyak... Asal bisa melihat senyum Suwon, aku sudah sangat bahagia.”

Yona, putri satu-satunya kerajaan Kouka telah lama memendam cinta pada Suwon, sepupunya. Saat ulang tahunnya yang ke-16, Yona bertekad memilih Suwon dan menolak perjodohan yang dipilihkan sang ayah.

Tapi yang terjadi di depan matanya membuat Yona harus kehilangan semuanya... ayahnya, kerajaannya dan cintanya pada Suwon...
description.it: Yona, principessa del Regno di Kouka e unica figlia del re, è cresciuta circondata dalle attenzioni del padre e della sua guardia del corpo Hak. Il giorno dei festeggiamenti per il suo sedicesimo compleanno arriva a corte suo cugino Suwon, di cui è innamorata. La ragazza è al settimo cielo, totalmente ignara del crudele scherzo che il destino ha in serbo per lei... un’attesissima saga fantasy intrisa di romanticismo, tra epiche lotte e antichi regni!
description.ja: 高華王国の姫・ヨナは一人娘のため、優しい父王と幼なじみで護衛のハク達に囲まれ、大切に育てられていた。そして時はヨナ・16歳の誕生日、ヨナは想いを寄せていた従兄のスウォンから簪を贈られ、父へ自分の気持ちを伝えに行く。が、そこには思いも寄らぬ過酷な運命が!?
description.ko:
고화국의 공주인 연화는 일 왕의 보호 아래 세상 일은 전혀 모른 채 항상 성 안에서 지내고 있었으며 그녀의 소꿉친구로는 학과 수원이 있었다. 그러나 부왕 일이 소꿉친구이자 짝사랑 상대였던 사촌 수원의 손에 살해 당하고, 이 광경을 목격한 연화는 16살의 생일에 일생 가장 큰 위기를 겪게 된다.

학의 도움으로 궁을 빠져나온 사이 수원이 고화국의 왕위를 계승하고, 연화는 마음을 추스르며 앞으로의 길을 모색하던 중, 문덕이 얘기한 신관 익수의 신탁을 듣고, 고화국의 건국신화 속 비룡왕을 보필하던 네 용의 후손을 찾는다.
description.pl: Księżniczka Yona, córka władcy państwa Koka, nigdy nie miała poważnych zmartwień. Dość powiedzieć, że za swoje największe nieszczęście uważała fakt, że jej kuzyn, Su-won, w którym skrycie się podkochiwała, nie traktował jej poważnie. Gdy więc młodzieniec przybył do pałacu, aby wziąć udział w uroczystości na cześć szesnastych urodzin księżniczki, ta nie posiadała się z radości. Jednak to właśnie tej nocy cały jej świat miał lec w gruzach. Su-won zamordował jej ojca, a następnie próbował zabić również Yonę. Od niechybnej śmierci uratował ją młody generał, a zarazem przyjaciel księżniczki, Son Hak. Jednak ucieczka z pałacu to dopiero początek. Czy Yona zdoła odnaleźć w sobie dość siły, aby zmierzyć się z okrutną rzeczywistością i odzyskać władzę?
description.ru:
Йона — единственная принцесса королевства Коука. Она ведет роскошную и беззаботную жизнь, как и подобает принцессам. У неё есть всё: лучшая одежда и косметика, превосходные сладости, любящий отец Император Иль, и сильнейшие чувства к кузену Су Вону, о котором многие могли лишь мечтать. Вот только если бы её телохранитель Сон Хак не так раздражал и её волосы не были такими красными.

Все меняется в ночь на шестнадцатый день рождения девушки. Почти идеальный мир быстро рассыпается, когда человек, которого она любит — Су Вон — убил её отца. Путь к его становлению на престол ныне гарантирован. Вместе с Хаком, Йона скрылась из замка в поисках помощи, и с этого момента они ведут жизнь в бегах…
description.th: เรื่องราวของ โยนะ องค์หญิงแห่งอาณาจักรโคกะที่มีเรือนผมหยักศกสีแดงสด เพราะเป็นพระธิดาพระองค์เดียว จึงได้รับการเลี้ยงดูมาอย่างทะนุถนอมโดยพระบิดาผู้อ่อนโยน กับ "ฮาคุ" ซึ่งเป็นทั้งเพื่อนสมัยเด็กและองครักษ์คอยคุ้มกัน และแล้วในวันเกิดอายุ 16 ปีของโยนะ "ซูวอน" ลูกพี่ลูกน้องที่โยนะมีใจให้ ได้มอบปิ่นปักผมเป็นของขวัญ จากนั้นโยนะก็ไปบอกความรู้สึกของตนให้กับบิดาที่คัดค้านการแต่งงานระหว่างเธอกับซูวอนรับรู้ แต่ที่นั่นมีชะตากรรมอันโหดร้ายที่คาดไม่ถึงรอคอยเธออยู่
description.tr: Kouka Krallığı’nın prensesi Yona, tek çocuk olduğu için hem çocukluk arkadaşı hem de koruması Hak ve yumuşak kalpli babası kral tarafından el üstünde tutularak büyütülmüştür. 16. doğum gününde Yona, küçüklüğünden beri hoşlandığı kuzeni Soo-Won’dan bir saç tokası alır. Kendi duygularından emin olan Yona konuşmak için babasının yanına gider. Ancak orada onu beklenmedik zalim bir kader beklemektedir! Bir ülkenin yıkıma nasıl gittiğini anlatan bu tarihi dram ve romantik fantazi başlasın.
description.vi: Yona là công chúa duy nhất của 1 vương quốc, sống cuộc sống xa hoa và vô ưu của 1 công chúa. Cô ấy có tất cả: những bộ quần áo lộng lẫy nhất, mỹ phẩm tuyệt nhất, đồ ngọt ngon nhất, có người cha là hoàng đế hết mực yêu thương, có người anh họ vô cùng điển trai, Soo-won, để ý đến. Nhưng, cô lại có một mái tóc màu đỏ và có một tên vệ sĩ vô cùng phiền nhiễu, Son Hak. Cuộc sống tưởng chừng hoàn hảo đó lại nhanh chóng tiêu tan khi người mà cô yêu, Soo-won, đã giết cha của cô để đảm bảo con đường lên nắm quyền của mình. Son Hak cùng Yona bỏ trốn và sống cuộc sống ẩn mình từ đó. (Lưu ý: Thực sự thì tên trong truyện có vẻ như mang hơi hướng Hàn Quốc, việc dịch phụ thuộc hoàn toàn vào Eng nên có gì các bạn thông cảm nhé, truyện này là manga chứ không phải manhwa đâu :D Hơn nữa chúng tớ cũng ko kiếm được wiki truyện này, có thì cũng chỉ toàn tên như trên thôi TT^TT)
description.pt-br: Yona, única princesa do reino, era apaixonada pelo seu primo e tinha uma vida luxuosamente despreocupada, como toda princesa. Mas tudo muda depois de uma traição que a obriga a fugir do castelo com seu guarda-costas, Son Hak. Nisso, eles descobrem sobre uma lenda que mudará totalmente o destino deles.
description.zh-hk: 從小備受父王及哈克寶貝呵護的高華國公主‧優娜，在她16歲生日的當天，她的心上人蘇芳來到宮殿，並送她漂亮的髮簪。不過優娜的父親並不允許她跟蘇芳的交往，依舊對蘇芳無法死心的優娜決定向父王表明她的心意時，卻意外地撞見父親被刺殺的驚人場面。不肯面對事實的優娜從此便與護衛哈克展開一連串的逃亡生活……

description.en:
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.

All beings in the firmament live locked in this infinite cycle. Or so it was until the day they came down from the heavens.

Humanity ceased to be human. Death is no longer the end. Enlightenment came to save her children and defeat the most powerful feeling that consciousness had been able to create.

___

SpaceDrum shows us a society that has evolved to a state of full well-being, freed from wars and conflicts, in search of Nirvana, thanks to the spiritual guidance of an alien race.
The aryas are an elite group charged with the external security of the planet and the protection of the high priestess.

They are chosen because, thanks to their control over their Virya, they are able to control mysterious fragments, the shards. Reda is a student at one of the most distinctive military academies, but he has difficulty controlling his special shard due to constant visions of a strange young woman. And this will not be the biggest of your problems...

title.en: Ore no tomodachi ♂♀ ga kawai sugite komaru!

altTitles.ja: 俺の友達♂♀が可愛すぎて困る！

altTitles.en: My Childhood Friend Is So Cute, It's Frustrating!
I Am Worried That My Childhood Friend Is Too Cute!

altTitles.vi: Người bạn thời thơ ấu của tôi quá dễ thương!

description.en: "If my guy friend turned into a girl, he would be the perfect girlfriend!" Returning to his hometown after 10 years, Amano Koichi is thrilled to finally reunite with his childhood friend, Yukio Sawatari on the first day of school when suddenly, he turns female! Yukio is affected by "Sudden sex change syndrome", a rare condition present in one every ten thousand people which randomly changes their gender!Koichi can't help but be flustered by his childhood friend's cuteness. How will this complicate their relationship? Will it develop into a forbidden romance?! Find out in this exciting TSF Rom-com!
description.id:
Amano, yang kembali ke kota tempat dia tinggal sewaktu kecil untuk pertama kalinya setelah 10 tahun, bertemu Yukio Sawatari, seorang teman masa kecil di hari pertama pemindahan, ketika dia (seorang teman pria) menjadi wanita! Meskipun dia berbagi suka citanya, saat dia tiba-tiba berubah menjadi seorang gadis dan tidak bisa menyembunyikan rasa malunya. Yukio terkena penyakit seperti 100.000 orang lainnya, tiba-tiba menjadi seorang gadis yang disebut "spontaneous isomerism metamorphosis"!  
  
Teman masa kecil perempuan ♂ yang imut dan dalam kesulitan!? Cinta TSF (transeksual) Terlarang!  
  
Kalo gak paham baca ajalah, ada sinopsis juga gak guna.
description.vi:
Khi trở về thành phố nơi từng sống sau 10 năm, Amano Koichi đã gặp lại người bạn tuổi thơ là Yukio Sawatari vào ngày đầu tiên ở trường mới thì bỗng nhiên Yukio lại đổi giới tính?! Anh bị ảnh hưởng bởi một căn bệnh chỉ có trong một trong mười nghìn người gọi là "hội chứng đổi giới đột ngột"! 

Từ đây bắt đầu câu truyện về tình yêu với người bạn tuổi thơ đổi giới.

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

description.en:
The downfall of a noble family. And a girl who risks her life seeking revenge.

“Lady Ayana.”

There was a knight who had been by her side for thirteen years. The person who came to her mind before her own family was going to be annihilated. He risked his life for her, suffered wounds, hunger, and gave her everything. Now, he is looking at her while she’s waiting for her execution with a joyful smile.

“Please show me another enjoyable story this time, my lady.”

The devil smiled and extended his hand, and the girl took it.

“I hope you get the ending you desire in the next story, my lady.”

(Source: Kakao, translated)
description.es: Ella tuvo que pasar por la aniquilación de su familia, él llegó al final de su vida para darle la oportunidad de vengarse. “Aiana.” El caballero que estuvo a mi lado durante 13 años, arriesgó su vida, sufrió, pasó hambre y lo dio todo por mí. Pero ahora, al presentarse mi muerte inminente, sonreía felizmente mientras contemplaba mi desceso. “Por favor, ten una historia agradable esta vez, mi señora”. El demonio sonrió y me tendió la mano. “Espero que en la próxima historia obtengas el final que deseas”

title.en: The Return of the Legendary Archmage

description.en:
Shin Ha-ryul is the prodigy of modern magical technology and artificial intelligence. However, he's been deemed an outcast for unable to be implanted.

A book appears before him, the magician who has been sentenced to death.

"To the posterity who can hear this voice and has the same constitution as me, I, Rai Bell Vaitener, leave this book."

Along with the book left behind by the legendary great mage, the frozen time of the genius begins to move again.
description.ko:
'이 목소리를 들을 수 있는 나와같은 채질의 후인에게, 나 레이벨 바이테너가 이 책을 남긴다.'

내가 AI 부적합자 라고?

현대 마법 기술의 총아, 인공지능을 이식할 수 없는 부적합자. 도태된 천재 마법사 신하율.

마법사로서 사형 선고를 받은 그의 앞에 한 권의 책이 나타난다.

'이 목소리를 들을 수 있는, 나와 똑같은 체질을 지닌 후인에게, 나 레이 벨 바이테너가 이 책을 남긴다.'

신화 속 대마법사가 남긴 책과 함께, 천재의 멈췄던 시간이 다시 움직이기 시작한다.

description.en:
"You've disturbed something that should have been left alone."
Lee Shin-hyuk, codenamed "Ventablack," is the Korean leader of "55" - an elite special operations unit selected from the world's top black agents. One day, his younger sister Sumin, who dreamed of becoming a K-pop idol trainee, is murdered in South America... and the world tries to cover up this fact.
After abandoning everything to investigate his sister's death, Shin-hyuk confirms that the international drug cartel "XICA" is likely behind it. Subsequently, for his revenge, he deliberately approaches his targets by becoming a bodyguard for "Yoo Chae-won," a global K-pop star whom they were originally targeting.
Finally, he plunges into Brazil's "Favela" - a land of death forsaken even by God...
description.pt-br:
"Você mexeu com algo que não devia."

Shin Hyuk, o líder coreano da unidade de elite das forças especiais "55", composta pelos melhores agentes do mundo, fica devastado quando sua irmã mais nova, Soo Min, que sonhava em se tornar uma trainee de idol, é assassinada na América do Sul. O mundo tenta encobrir a verdade. Abandonando tudo para investigar a morte de sua irmã, Shin Hyuk descobre que o cartel internacional de drogas "XICA" é o provável culpado. Em busca de vingança, ele se aproxima deliberadamente da estrela global do K-pop "Yoo Chae-won", que era o alvo original deles, como seu guarda-costas. No final, ele mergulha na mortal "favela" brasileira, uma terra onde até os deuses viraram as costas...

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yankee Shimizu-san ga Kami o Kuroku Sometekita

altTitles.ja: 隣の席のヤンキー清水さんが髪を黒く染めてきた

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Seki no Yankee Shimizu-san ga Kami wo Kuroku Sometekita

altTitles.en: The Delinquent Shimizu-san Sitting Next to Me Has Dyed Her Hair Black

altTitles.vi: Cô bạn học sinh cá biệt shimizu-san ngồi kế tôi nhuộm tóc lại thành màu đen

altTitles.id: Gadis Preman di Sebelahku Menghitamkan Rambutnya

description.en:
"I dyed my hair black for you... so notice me."

Shimizu-san, the delinquent highschool girl who sits next to Hondo with her newly-dyed hair, gradually lowered her voice, slightly blushed, and laid her face down on the desk. After that, when Daiki Hondo talked with his friend about how he wanted be with a girl who can cook, the next day Hondo ended up partnered with Shimizu-san in cooking class, even though she used to always skip class. 

When Hondo mentioned that he wished he could try a girl's hand-made cooking, for some reason she brought two bentos to lunch the next day and shared one with Hondo…

This is a coming-of-age romantic comedy with Shimizu-san, a delinquent highschool girl who is clumsy in love.

---

- [Official Twitter (LN)](https://x.com/yanmizusan)
description.ja:
お前のために髪を黒く染めたんだから……、気づけよな。

「髪染めたんだね」
「ああ」「どうして髪染めたの?」
「お前なんでって……、昨日お前が……」
僕の隣の席に座る金髪から黒髪に染めたヤンキーJK・清水さんは声が少しずつ小さくなり、少し顔を赤らめて机に顔を伏せた。
その後も僕、本堂大輝が友人との恋バナで「女子と一緒に料理したい」と話すと、翌日、いつも授業をサボる清水さんと一緒に料理することになったり、「女子の手料理食べてみたい」と話すと、なぜか二つあるお弁当を分けてくれたり……。
学校で一番怖いヤンキー、実は恋愛に不器用で乙女な清水さんとの青春ラブコメ。

---

- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330654424803992)
- [Official LN (JP)](https://sneakerbunko.jp/series/yanmizusan)
description.pt-br:
Eu pintei meu cabelo de preto para você... então me note.

"Shimizu-san, você pintou seu cabelo de preto."
"Ah, sim." "Por que você o pintou de repente?"
"Porque... ontem..."

Shimizu-san, a colegial ianque que se senta ao lado de Hondo, com seu cabelo recém-tingido, gradualmente abaixou sua voz, corou levemente e deitou seu rosto na mesa. Depois disso, quando Daiki Hondo falou com seu amigo sobre como ele queria estar com uma garota que sabia cozinhar, no dia seguinte Hondo acabou fazendo dupla com Shimizu-san na aula de culinária, embora ela sempre matasse aula. Quando Hondo mencionou que gostaria de experimentar a culinária artesanal de uma garota, por algum motivo ela trouxe dois bentos para o almoço no dia seguinte e dividiu um com Hondo...

altTitles.en: ゼロのちゅかいま　-よーちえんnano!-
ゼロのちゅかいまよーちえんｎａｎｏ！

description.en: A 4-koma featuring super-deformed versions of the cast of Zero no Tsukaima.

altTitles.ja: 後藤さんは振り向かせたい

altTitles.en: Gotou-san Wants Me to Turn Around

altTitles.fr: Gotou-san veut que je me retourne

altTitles.es: Gotou-san Quiere Que me Dé la Vuelta.

description.en: Gotou-san, the prettiest girl in school, tries to get the attention of Maeda-kun, who sits in front of her. She secretly harbors a crush on him, but Maeda, who lacks self-confidence, doesn't notice her feelings. What is the future of Gotou-san's unwavering love?
description.es: La chica más guapa de la escuela, Gotou-san, siempre está tonteando con Maeda-kun, el chico sentado frente a ella. Ella está secretamente enamorada de él, pero Maeda-kun, que es inseguro de sí mismo, no entiende sus intenciones.
description.fr: Gotou-san, la plus jolie fille de l'école, demande quelque chose à Maeda-kun devant lui. Gotou-san l'aime secrètement, mais Maeda, qui ne lui fait pas confiance, ne la remarque pas.Quel est l'avenir de l'amour indéfectible de Gotou-san ?
description.ja:
その恋心に気付いてほしい！

学校一の美少女・後藤さんは前の席の前田くんになにかとちょっかいをかけてくる。そこには後藤さんの秘めたる恋心があるのだが、自分に自信のない前田君にはその意図は全く伝わらない。果たして後藤さんの一途な恋の行く末は？

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.ja: ストランド

description.en: Four high school classmates, not exactly close friends, share moments that are both fun and irreplaceable, yet tinged with a quiet heartache they don’t even realize. 'It feels like time has stopped.' Youth is both vibrant and muted. These are the daily lives of high schoolers—and the strange twists in between. A story that explores the meaning of a small act of courage in an unconventional coming-of-age drama (Anti-Electric Parade) begins!

altTitles.ja: 飛と龍子

description.en:
Otogiri Tobi, a youth living with a "talkative bag", Baku. In his monotonous life, an inhuman girl calling herself Ryuuko appears in front of him and...!?

An unusual roomshare begins under a single roofー!!

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en:
300 years ago, the invincible warrior Hyeon-oh Kim brought down the Tower of the End, preventing the world’s demise. Though he should have died the moment the Tower of the End collapsed, Hyeon-oh is reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17-year-old boy named Juhyeok Kim.

Meanwhile, he discovers the existence of the Constellations, who were once his disciples 300 years ago but were born during the time when he did not exist in this world. Will he be able to find them again and train them?

altTitles.ja: 愛と呪い

description.en: A semi-autobiographical account of the author as she experiences abuse, sexual and otherwise, at the hands of her family who are also deeply religious. Aiko wished for someone to kill her and the world she lives in. With the Great Hanshin Earthquake, the Aleph doomsday cult, and the Kobe child murders, it seemed like the ends of time was approaching. Unable to dream of "somewhere away from here", all she can do is face her violent life head-on.
description.es-la: Historia semi-autobiográfico de la autora mientras sufre abusos sexuales y otro tipo de cosas, a manos de su familia, que también es profundamente religiosa. Aiko deseaba que alguien acabara con ella y con el mundo en el que vive. Con el Gran Terremoto de Hanshin, la secta del Juicio Final Aleph y los asesinatos de niños de Kobe, parecía que se acercaba el fin de los tiempos. Incapaz de soñar con "algún lugar lejos de aquí", lo único que puede hacer es enfrentarse de frente a su violenta vida.

altTitles.ja: 愛しの故・シャーロット

description.en:
Orphans Charlotte and William finally confess their feelings for each other and promised to be together forever. Yet, Charlotte is suddenly killed in a motor accident, leaving William devastated. Death is usually the end of most relationships, but it seems that Will has other plans…  
(source: aoc.moe)
